column2: it is recommended to precise here)

column1: # minFrequencyMax [Hz] is an optional parameter that DSM will compute
# timeWindowMinimum/timeWindow is an optional parameter that decides the width of the time Window in second
# The real width timeWindow will be the smallest 2^Integer*0.1 [s] bigger than or equal to timeWindowMinimum
# but we take 3276.8 [s] if not declared.
# (we ignore timeWindowMinimum in case of declarations of two variables)
